snippet.title: Gun Showdown (2006) [PSP] - RetroArch with PPSSPP
snippet.description:
Gun: Showdown is an action game where you play the role of Colton White, a gunslinger in the wild west. Your friend is killed and you go on a quest for revenge and justice.

The game involves gunplay, horse-riding, and several mini-games and is a handheld version of the game #Gun available for PC and several consoles. This version contains several new side missions and game modes exclusive to the PSP.

--
This is the official second but simplest page of @LibRetro for #RetroArch. Our goal is to share the game videos we got while using our cores. The performance of  the content is to differ from content to content and from core to core.

Don't forget to follow our pages below.

https://libretro.com/
https://retroarch.com/
https://www.youtube.com/Libretro
--
Version: 1.9.14
System: XBOX Series S
Core: PPSSPP
